title: GTA San Andreas RIP - Hater7
description:
GTA SA RIP. This game is RIPPED, that means you do not have to install it, you only need to extract the files where you want them to be and PLAY! NO installation, NO crak, NO serial needed! Just extract the files and play. With this RIP you can extract the files in a pendrive or external device and play the game in several computer without installing it. You just connect the device to the computer, open the game and start playin'; when you finish, you close it and disconnect the device.
You can save the game in one computer and keep playin' from you saved in another computer! ItÂ´s a portable game!

You can also extract it in your computer and play it from there. ThereÂ´s no need for an external device, itÂ´s your choice!

Just double-click on "gta_sa.exe" and start playin' ... ThereÂ´s also a saved game if you don't feel like playin' from the start!

Enjoy and remember to SEED!!!!

Hater 7
